languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс потирает лицо и поднимает на вас взгляд слегка расфокусированных глаз. Впрочем, как только дознаватель сосредотачивается, он смотрит за ваше плечо — и застывает, встретившись взглядом с Маражаем. На лице дознавателя начинает расцветать выражение звериной ярости.{/n}

{n}Heinrix rubs his face and looks up at you, his eyes somewhat unfocused. As soon as he manages to focus, however, his gaze shifts over your shoulder. Then he freezes, having met Marazhai's gaze. Heinrix's face takes on an expression of primal ferocity.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс потирает лицо и поднимает на вас взгляд слегка расфокусированных глаз. Впрочем, как только дознаватель сосредотачивается, он смотрит за ваше плечо — и застывает, встретившись взглядом с Маражаем. На лице дознавателя начинает расцветать выражение звериной ярости.{/n}

traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは顔をこすりながらあなたを見上げるが、ボンヤリとしている。焦点が合うとすぐに、彼の視線はあなたの肩の後ろに移動し、マラズハイに視線を向けて固まる。ハインリックスの表情には獰猛さが現れる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix rubs his face and looks up at you, his eyes somewhat unfocused. As soon as he manages to focus, however, his gaze shifts over your shoulder. Then he freezes, having met Marazhai's gaze. Heinrix's face takes on an expression of primal ferocity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは顔をこすりながらあなたを見上げるが、ボンヤリとしている。焦点が合うとすぐに、彼の視線はあなたの肩の後ろに移動し、マラズハイに視線を向けて固まる。ハインリックスの表情には獰猛さが現れる。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}海因里希揉了揉脸，抬头看着你，目光有些失焦。他努力调整着视线，目光越过了你的肩膀，迎上了玛拉斋的目光。他惊呆了，愣在原地，随后脸上立刻露出了野蛮、残暴的表情。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix rubs his face and looks up at you, his eyes somewhat unfocused. As soon as he manages to focus, however, his gaze shifts over your shoulder. Then he freezes, having met Marazhai's gaze. Heinrix's face takes on an expression of primal ferocity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希揉了揉脸，抬头看着你，目光有些失焦。他努力调整着视线，目光聚集在你身后，迎上了玛拉斋的目光。他惊呆了，愣在原地，随后脸上立刻露出了野蛮、残暴的表情。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix se frota la cara y te mira, con los ojos algo desenfocados. Sin embargo, en cuanto logra enfocar, mira por encima de tu hombro. Se queda inmóvil al encontrar la mirada de Marazhai. El rostro de Heinrix adopta una expresión de ferocidad primigenia.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix rubs his face and looks up at you, his eyes somewhat unfocused. As soon as he manages to focus, however, his gaze shifts over your shoulder. Then he freezes, having met Marazhai's gaze. Heinrix's face takes on an expression of primal ferocity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix se frota la cara y te mira, con los ojos algo desenfocados. Sin embargo, en cuanto logra enfocar, su mirada se desplaza detrás de ti. Se queda inmóvil al encontrar la mirada de Marazhai. El rostro de Heinrix adopta una expresión de ferocidad primigenia.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix reibt sich das Gesicht und blickt mit etwas verschwommenen Augen zu dir auf. Sobald er aber wieder klar sehen kann, blickt er über deiner Schulter. Sein Blick trifft auf Marazhai und er erstarrt. Heinrixs Gesicht nimmt einen Ausdruck urzeitlicher Wildheit an.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix rubs his face and looks up at you, his eyes somewhat unfocused. As soon as he manages to focus, however, his gaze shifts over your shoulder. Then he freezes, having met Marazhai's gaze. Heinrix's face takes on an expression of primal ferocity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix reibt sich das Gesicht und blickt mit etwas verschwommenen Augen zu dir auf. Sobald er aber wieder klar sehen kann, blickt er hinter deiner Schulter. Sein Blick trifft auf Marazhai und er erstarrt. Heinrix' Gesicht nimmt einen Ausdruck urzeitlicher Wildheit an.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix se frotte le visage et lève les yeux dans votre direction, luttant visiblement pour concentrer son attention sur vous. Lorsqu'enfin il y parvient, son regard se porte derrière vous et croise celui de Marazhai. L'interrogateur se fige, tout en lui n'exprimant plus qu'une férocité primaire.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix rubs his face and looks up at you, his eyes somewhat unfocused. As soon as he manages to focus, however, his gaze shifts over your shoulder. Then he freezes, having met Marazhai's gaze. Heinrix's face takes on an expression of primal ferocity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix se frotte le visage et lève les yeux dans votre direction, luttant visiblement pour concentrer son attention sur vous. Lorsqu'enfin il y parvient, son regard coule par-dessus votre épaule et croise celui de Marazhai. L'interrogateur se fige, tout en lui n'exprimant plus que la férocité à l'état pur.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yüzünü ovuşturan Heinrix, başını kaldırıp sana baksa da odaklanmakta zorlanıyor. Odaklanmayı başardığındaysa bakışları, arkanda bir yerlere kayıyor. Ardından Marazhai'la göz göze gelip donakalıyor. Heinrix'in yüz ifadesinde ilkel bir gaddarlık görünüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix rubs his face and looks up at you, his eyes somewhat unfocused. As soon as he manages to focus, however, his gaze shifts over your shoulder. Then he freezes, having met Marazhai's gaze. Heinrix's face takes on an expression of primal ferocity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix yüzünü ovuşturduktan sonra başını kaldırıp sana bakarken gözleri odaklanmakta zorlanıyor sanki. Odaklanmayı başardığındaysa bakışları, arkanda bir yerlere kayıyor. Ardından Marazhai'la göz göze gelip donakalıyor. Heinrix'in yüz ifadesinde ilkel bir gaddarlık görünüyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
